name: Grayscale World
description:
Grayscale World is a game prototype we made for fun during the end of 2017.

The game is a Super Meat Boy like platformer where you are a little cube with the power to change your color.  Remember that the environment around you interacts depending to your color: Black collides with Black, White collides with White.

Controls:

Menù Controls: 
- Press "Play" to play the game. The first time you open the level selection, the game will require you to insert your name
- Press "Reset" to delete all your saves. Next time you'll press "Play" you'll have to choose a new name

Main Controls:
- a, d : move left and right
- space : jump
- left shift : run
- alt gr / mouse right : change color
- esc : pause

Alternative Controls:
- left arrow, right arrow  : move left and right
- x  : jump
- z : run
- c : change color

Gamepad Controls:
- left joystick  : move left and right
- A Button : jump
- B Button / RB/ R Trigger  : run
- X Button / LB / L Trigger : change color
- start : pause
